programme.title: Better Halves Ep18
programme.desc: A pampered matchmaker's carefree life comes to an end when her parents are falsely imprisoned. With the help of a mysterious young master, she sets off to save them & restore her family's name.

programme.title: The Legend Of Yang Jian
programme.desc: Yang Jian descends Kunlun mountain to retrieve Pangu's axe, battling Shen Gong Bao with assistance from Xiao Tian, Feng Ling'er, Feng You Wei and others.

programme.title: Beneath The Undertow Ep10
programme.desc: After a severed female foot is found in an abandoned chemical plant's sewage pool, Detectives Lian Hai Ping & rookie Shi Qiang Feng are sent to investigate the mystery behind the case.

programme.title: Bride And The Beast
programme.desc: Every year, a young girl must be sacrificed to the mountain god or a curse would befall their small village. Two young men must now rescue their beloved when she is chosen to be sacrifice.

programme.title: Xu Fu Treasure
programme.desc: Based on the historical & folklore tale of Xu Fu's journey to the East, the story tells of Chen Qi Long, who strives to protect the country's treasures from falling into the hands of the enemy.

programme.title: Monster
programme.desc: Set in the late Ming Dynasty, the story follows 3 friends, Qi Feng, Yang Shiyi and Yun Xiaotian, who uncover and dismantle a scam led by feudal superstition and corruption.

programme.title: HAHAHAHAHA S5 Ep06
programme.desc: Led by Deng Chao, Chen He, Fan Zhi Yi, and Wang Mian, the "Five Ha" team travels through Xinjiang, Hainan, and Sichuan, blending comedy with local culture to showcase China's diverse folk traditions.

programme.title: Seven Heroes Beat The Monster
programme.desc: To prevent the resurgence of the dreaded Wu Xiang, young You Xi sought to unite the Six Great Saints & unseal Sun Wukong, who unbeknownst to You Xi, was also sealed with Wu Xiang.

programme.title: Northward Ep13
programme.desc: Six childhood friends grow up together & head north to pursue their dreams. Spanning three generations, the story reflects heritage, perseverance & youthful passion.

programme.title: The Chi Dragon Slash
programme.desc: At the end of the Tang Dynasty, Navy General Qian Liu set off to exterminate the river pirates, only to discover a mystical two-headed beast called the Chi dragon in a cave.

programme.title: Second Life
programme.desc: Years ago, a little boy is born in prison and his mother was forced to give him up, losing all contact with him. When she is released, she tries her best to make amends to rebuild their relationship.

programme.title: HAHAHAHAHA S5 Ep07
programme.desc: Led by Deng Chao, Chen He, Fan Zhi Yi, and Wang Mian, the "Five Ha" team travels through Xinjiang, Hainan, and Sichuan, blending comedy with local culture to showcase China's diverse folk traditions.

programme.title: The Drunken Prodigy
programme.desc: A spoiled young man with a passion for martial arts loses his entire fortune when he falls victim to a series of traps set by malicious gang while pursuing the top courtesan.
